references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard J. A., ed. Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2000. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/43970336.

description: This ancient river of Asia Minor has been identified with the modern Sarısu Çayı in Turkey. It was a tributary of the Tembris (modern Porsuk Çayı), joining it near Dorylaion (modern Eskişehir).
